text:
@ZekeJMiller @PressSec First Place Trophies for USA:
- COVID-19 Cases
- COVID-19 Deaths
- Cost of Health Care
- Thoughts and Prayers
- Ignorant Politicians

I am sick of all the "winning." I admit it. Can he please stop now? Please?
